Description:
SOLD BEFORE AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
**SOLD BEFORE AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437***
NO BODY CORPORATE - Designed to make the most of its privileged Highlands Estate location overlooking Thorngrove Reserve, this sophisticated town home is refined in concept, rich in character and quality. Impressive spaces for contemporary living and dining, including a stylish Caesar-stone and stainless steel fitted kitchen, lead to a low-maintenance outdoor backdrop of pleasing depth. Alluring 2 bedroom accommodation on the upstairs level features a main bedroom accompanied by an elegant central/semi-ensuite bathroom and beautiful balcony views over the park. Freshly painted, further enhanced by timber floors, heating/cooling and convenient secure carport, this is a residence that delivers desirable proximity to Aitken Creek Primary School and the Mount Ridley College campus while Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre is always easily reached. An excellent opportunity to attain a great lifestyle or to acquire a reliably rewarding investment property, this address is ideal either way!
***Photo ID required BY ALL PEOPLE who inspect our properties with My Agent Real Estate***
My Agent Real Estate, a boutique agency offering a high level of service and innovative Real Estate practices to our clients right across Melbourne. Contact Adriano on 0402 055 437, or visit our web site www.myagentre.com.au where you can see all our listings and apply for our properties on line.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Perfect Property for First Home Buyer or Investor in Premium Location
Expression of Interest closing by 4th of July by 5.00pm
This quality build family home is only 5-year-old and still comes with balance of builders warranty, built designed to live, entertain and enjoy a unique lifestyle with family and friends for years to come, combining modern free flowing floorplan and unparalleled quality, showcasing commanding street presence.
Sitting amongst the finest neighbourhood in a very sought after location close to walking distance to Craigieburn central, local schools, well maintained park lands, health & leisure centres and public transport, this is the perfect home where you want to grow your family.
The notable features are
Large double story home on approx. 360m2 land
3 bedrooms make it ideal for first home buyer, investor or downsizer.
Spacious kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances
Luxury master suite with access to its own balcony with uninterrupted views of the parkland just opposite the house.
Alfresco to entertain friends and family for years to come.
Evaporative cooling & ducted heating
Security alarm and cctv camera system for added security
High ceilings
Remote operated double garage.
Spacious low maintenance backyard. Let your kids & pets run freely in the safety of your backyard.
Inspection is must. Call today.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
SOLD BEFORE AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
**SOLD BEFORE AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437**
This freshly updated 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom town-home delivers outstanding dual level appeal in the Highland Estate's finest position directly opposite parkland expanses, a moment's walk from Highland's shopping centre, recreation facilities and the Mount Ridley College campus. Exceptionally generous downstairs spaces featuring a Caesar-stone and stainless steel fitted kitchen combine open-plan ease with effective zoning for living and dining complemented by superb outlooks beneath luxurious upstairs accommodation including a main bedroom with an elegant ensuite and beautiful balcony views over the park. All the bedrooms reveal substantial proportions and built-in robes while the central bathroom is impeccably presented - in keeping with the entire property! A full size laundry, guest's powder room, fresh paint, plush new carpet and new timber floors further distinguish a residence that flows to a deep, low-maintenance backdrop with inviting alfresco dimensions and a secure double garage reached by private via ROW. Enjoy modern perfection.
***Photo ID required by all people who inspect our properties with My Agent Real Estate***

Description:
PRESENTATION, POSITION, PERFECT!
Spacious design, striking dÃ©cor and landscaped surrounds illustrate the allure of this impeccable 4 bedroom home providing a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle in a quiet yet wonderfully convenient pocket of Craigieburn.
Light and bright interior features new carpet throughout, roomy master suite with walk-in robe and sparkling ensuite with double vanity, 3 further well-appointed bedrooms each with built-in robes, main family bathroom with tub and separate toilet. Add to this well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, gas cook top, walk in pantry, spacious and versatile open-plan living/dining area leading out to an alfresco style undercover entertaining zone, making it the centerpiece of this home.
Further features of the home include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, internally accessed double-garage, ceiling fans and much more. Only minutes drive from childcare facilities, reserves, local shops, Kolbe College, selection of Primary Schools and also offers easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping centers & Aitkin Boulevard.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
The Perfect Start!
Located in a very sought after pocket in the Aston Estate with close proximity to Craigieburn Central, schools, parks and public transport. Comprising separate entrance with high ceilings running throughout, 3 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite & WIR and all with BIR's), open plan living good size kitchen with Caesar stone bench top & WIP overlooking meals and family area with access to outdoor entertaining area, central bathroom, roomy laundry, side driveway leading to a single garage (with internal access).
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, 2Xreverse cycle cooling, alarm system, kitchen appliances, dishwasher, blinds and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers And Investors
Set in a prestige neighbourhood this well-maintained residence offers exceptional value as a home or smart rental investment. Comprising great sized bedrooms with built-in-robes, formal lounge room, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, well-appointed kitchen with adjoining meals area, master bedroom with ensuite, MASSIVE lock up garage with extra storage and car accommodation for up to 4 cars as well as ample off street parking. All set on a large allotment and with plenty of scope for further enhancement this cosy abode offers a stress free lifestyle situated within walking distance to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, schools and leisure centre.
This property would also be perfect for somebody looking at getting into the local market, starting that investment portfolio or the smart builder/developer offering great potential to re develop into a multi-unit site (subject to council approval) in a great location

Description:
Fully-Optioned Family Perfection!
Perfectly positioned with North orientation, this approx. 45 square residence offers spacious living and ample accommodation with plenty of room for the growing family. Offering a fantastic floor plan, you will appreciate from the moment you step inside that it delivers a family environment, quality, vast and versatile design and premium inclusions throughout.
Offering 4 well proportioned Bedrooms, all with walk- in robes, study/ fifth bedroom/ entertainment room, and one bath downstairs. There is an abundance of natural light creating an inviting interior which showcases an extra large master bedroom/ retreat with a huge walk- in robe and luxurious ensuite, also featuring an open formal lounge/ dining room, well- appointed kitchen with stone bench, stainless steel appliances, walk- in pantry with an open meals area and family area.
Outside offers a fantastic grassed area large enough for the kids to play and entertain family and friends. This complete family home has been very well kept and sure to impress the astute buyer.
Features include: zoned ducted heating, timber floorboards throughout, upstairs balcony with beautiful views, double remote lock up garage with internal access and exceptional storage options. Located within close proximity to all the existing facilities Craigieburn has to offer and within walking distance to schools, public transport, local shops, community centre and park lands.
Land: Approx: 429m2
Settlement: 60 or 90 days
Contact: Dom Zampaglione 0414 453 365
or
Contact: Vito Trentadue 0434 813 100

Description:
SOLD $450,000 BY NICK RISTEVSKI
Under Instructions from The Executors
Beautifully presented brick veneer home set on a corner block of 649sqm in a quiet court locale. Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes, L-shape lounge room, fully functioning kitchen complete with ample storage and bench space. A second living area and dining room with sliding door gives access to a large undercover area with built in brick BBQ, ideal for entertaining friends and family. The bright bathroom with bathtub and separate shower, separate toilet, and laundry with storage cupboards complete the home. Outside boasts a large rear yard with lock up rear shed, and double carport with drive through access to rear. Perfect setting to renovate or develop (STCA).
Additional features include carpet, tiles, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roller shutters, secure lock up back garden set on 649qm.
Perfect for first home buyers, investors or developers alike - this is one not to miss!
Land Size: 649sqm
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price
Heating: Ducted
Cooling: Evaporative
Council Rates: $1600 pa approx
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days
Rental Appraisal: $320 -$350pw approx
Nearest Primary Schools: Willmott Park PS, Our Lady Catholic PS, Craigieburn PS
Nearest Secondary Schools: Craigieburn Secondary college
Nearest Public Transport: Bus routes, Craigieburn train station
ONLINE AUCTION Sat 8th August at 11am (unless sold prior)

Description:
Inspection By Appointment Only
YES you will fall in love with this 5 bedrooms home!
Whether youre looking forward to buying a secured investment, upsizing your family home or buying your first home to live in, this house is the right choice.
This lovely home will impress you from first sight.sitting on 400m2 approx. located in a friendly quite neighbourhood, close to Public Transport, Schools, Parklands, Craigieburn Shopping Centres and much more
Comprising of a good size master bedroom with stylish full ensuite and walk-in robe, great size second, third, fourth and fifth bedrooms all with built in robes. A wide entry leading to an amazing open plan area comprising of a modern designed spacious kitchen and a huge central family living area. A fully equipped laundry for your comfort, a modern central bathroom and separate toilet and a double car garage with side access to the backyard area.
WHAT ABOUT THE FEATURES'''''
This lovely home has plenty of features including high ceilings, large windows, stainless steel kitchen appliances including a gas stove, oven and range-hood, all window coverings, tiles and floorboards, security door, split system cooling, ducted heating, down lights throughout and more!
SO, Is this what youre looking for''
If your answer is yes, then this amazing house is awaiting your visit, this is one not to be missed..
CALL Chawki Mallouk today on 0413 370 414 to arrange an inspection.

Brand New, Perfectly designed & Meticulously built house, offered with excellence and not to mention the great location with all facilities nearby including Craigieburn Highland shopping centre, school, Supermarket, public transport and Hume highway. Features Include:
Master Bedroom showcasing a walk-in wardrobe and big en-suite with Double Vanity, Twin shower & Spa

The open plan kitchen is located perfectly to incorporate the meals and family area
Refrigerated Central Heating and Cooling with 4 Zones, High ceilings, High Doors
Smart Lighting and LED down lights throughout the house
Double car garage and much more to offer
TO BOOK YOUR RIVATE INSPECTION CALL SMILEY SANDHU 0425642583

Description:
Light and Style with a Sensational Studio Apartment!
Absolutely one of a kind, this semi-detached townhouse provides a modern lifestyle of flair and flexibility with its quality features, generous floorplan and spacious self-contained studio at the rear.
Every room bathed in natural light, the home's impeccable interior showcases 2 genuinely large bedrooms (both with built-in robes), together with a stylish central bathroom and additional powder room.
Adding to its appeal is a versatile open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a stone-bench kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher.
Along with gas heating and split-system air conditioning (both levels), the home also boasts efficient LED lighting, a full-size laundry, large under-stair storeroom and security shutters all-round for added privacy and peace of mind.
Step outside to discover a sizeable courtyard and oversized single garage (remote-control) with drive-through option, plus the unique advantage of a substantial studio apartment above including its own kitchen, bathroom and private entrance.
Parkland across the road and Grand Boulevard buses virtually at your doorstep, it's also close to Mount Ridley College, Malcolm Creek trails, as well as easy access to both Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres.
Brilliant!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Brand New Porter Davis Masterpiece!
With its instant street appeal this beautifully designed & spacious Porter Davis home will tick all the boxes on your must have wish list, that will accommodate all your needs.
This free-flowing floor plan comprises of 3 bedrooms, ensuite with double vanities & walk-in robe to main, fully equipped kitchen with a large walk-in pantry overlooking a spacious open plan living with family & dining room, plus the added bonus of a rumpus/ lounge room, double remote garage with internal access & landscaped front & rear yard.
Featuring full turn-key inclusions & premium upgrades, including, roller blinds, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED downlights to entry & living areas, alarm, letterbox, clothesline, fencing & much more.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by.

Description:
A Flawless Integration of Space & Family Comfort!
Be seduced by this quality built Henley home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list.
Flanked by beautifully landscaped gardens, walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms, walk-in robe & ensuite to a huge master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large-scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, walk-in pantry & ample Ceasar Stone bench space.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers pergola which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration.
Located to perfection, just around the corner from the Highlands display village, within close proximity to local schools, Craigieburn Central, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including ducted heating, powerful split system cooling, double remote garage, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Offers closing 6th July by 6.00pm
Perfectly proportioned with space, nature and location. Youll understand why this property has been tightly held throughout its lifetime.
Youll love this magnificent property for:
Large light filled bedrooms with built in robes.
Spacious updated kitchen overlooking the garden.
Outdoor entertainment area blending seamlessly with the backyard greenery.
Carport & garage catering multiple cars.
Storage & garden sheds.
Other notable features are 10 panel solar system, water tank, LED lights throughout, new carpets, new evaporative cooling and meter box unit, soft closing cupboards and much more!
Situated in a family friendly location moments from all major amenities such as Craigieburn Central, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Craigieburn Sports Stadium, Craigieburn Library, Craigieburn Public Golf Course, Craigieburn Health Service, Willmott Park Primary School, Our Lady's Catholic Primary School, bus stops and Craigieburn Station.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
Quality and Style for Perfect Modern Living!
No need to build when you move straight into this as-new single-level home that's sure to exceed all expectations with its free-flowing design, impressive upgrades and immaculate surroundings.
Flawlessly presented and meticulously detailed, the home's impressive interior comprises 3 generous bedrooms (master with WIR) together with a stylish double ensuite and main central bathroom - both with stone-top vanities.
Bathed in natural light, the versatile open-plan living/dining area is further enhanced by a well-appointed kitchen complete with stone benches (including island breakfast bar), large walk-in pantry, dishwasher and 900mm cooking appliances.
High square set ceilings, high doors, Ducted heating and dual split-system air conditioning add to the appeal, along with efficient lighting, alarm system, CCTV and family-sized laundry facilities, plus a sunny backyard, decked alfresco and remote-control garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to the bus stop on Grevillea Street, it also offers close proximity to Craigieburn's expanding range of kinder/childcare facilities, primary and secondary schools, popular parks, playgrounds and shopping centres, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Road and important amenities
Inspection times -
Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Family Excellence on Approximately 871sqm of Land!
Occupying one of the area's largest allotments complete with parkland backdrop, this picture-perfect residence provides an idyllic environment for growing families with its spacious single-level floorplan, impeccable presentation and amazing outdoor space to enjoy.
Every room filled with natural light, the home's inviting interior comprises a large master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with BIRs) and spotless central bathroom.
Add to this a separate lounge at the front, versatile living room to the rear, and expansive open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher.
High ceilings, ducted heating and evaporative cooling enhance its appeal, along with an alarm system, solar/gas hot water, full-size laundry, double garage (remote-control) with storage room and drive-through option, plus a paved outdoor entertaining area and simply enormous north-facing backyard for the kids to run wild.
Malcolm Creek trails and acres of parkland virtually at your doorstep, it's also walking distance to Aitken Boulevard buses and Mount Ridley College, as well as easy access to both Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres.

Description:
An Affordable Family Package of Flair and Flexibility!
In a tree-lined street convenient to everything Craigieburn has to offer, this freestanding home is an ideal choice for young families thanks to its versatile living spaces, impressive inclusions and impeccable surrounds.
Ready to simply move in and enjoy, the home's attractive interior comprises a generous master bedroom with its own WIR and private ensuite, along with 2 further bedrooms (both with BIRs), spotless central bathroom and separate (second) WC.
Enhancing its wow factor is a light-filled open living/dining area and adjoining lounge for added flexibility - all complemented by a stone-top kitchen with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks and stainless steel appliances.
High ceilings throughout, the home also includes efficient LED lighting, ducted heating and split-system a/c, large laundry, sunny north-facing backyard with al-fresco entertaining area plus a remote-control garage with internal access and drive-through option.
Walking distance to Watermill Reserve, Thorngrove Reserve and Waterview Boulevard buses, it's also close to Malcolm Creek parkland and endless trails, Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres, as well as easy access to Aitken Creek Primary School and Mount Ridley College.
Insights: 14 Greenham Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Live At The Centre of Everything
Built to withstand the test of times, much loved & cherished for over 25 years & impeccably presented, this proud brick veneer beauty lends itself perfectly for all homebuyers, investors and developers alike.
Spread out on a whopping 668m2 and tucked away in a quiet court, in a brilliant location close to Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Willmott Park Primary School, walking distance to transport, backing onto Victor Foster Football Oval, Parks & Recreational facilities and all-important amenities presents an affordable home that will no doubt have you jumping for joy from the moment you step foot inside.
Filled with natural light, the homes immaculate interior comprises 3 great sized bedrooms, central bathroom & separate WC, dual living zones including a great sized rumpus room, a spacious front lounge leading through to an open dining area & adjoining a well appointed kitchen with ample cupboard and bench space and should you feel up for all-seasons entertaining outdoors, the home effortlessly links outside to a covered pergola and a private backyard where kids can play until their heart's content.
Complete with gas heating, powerful split system cooling, roomy laundry, 20x solar panels, a massive brick garage, garden shed and so much more!
Get in fast, as a home this good never lasts!
Insights: 10 Rosanna Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
LAND A GREAT FAMILY HOME IN MT AITKEN!
Positioned in the highly exclusive Mt Aitken estate, this immaculately presented family home provides space and comfort the whole family will enjoy. Situated on an expansive (520m2 approx) corner allotment with potential for side access (subject to council approval), this sizeable home features a free flowing floorplan that boasts sizeable bedroom accommodation, grand livings spaces and the epitome of cooking domains.
A well-positioned study / office to the front of the home makes an ideal work from home space, whilst the memorable master bedroom suite features a double vanity ensuite and a superbly organised walk in robe with built in shelves, drawers and double hanging space .
The dual living zones that include equipped theatre room and open plan family room are centred around the stunning kitchen domain which comprises of 900ml appliances, walk through pantry with double sink and fridge outlet. The elaborate meals area flows onto an enclosed al fresco dining space that can be utilised year round.
Other features of this attractive home include expansive backyard, security cameras, garden shed, double blinds, 2.7 ceilings, electric roller shutters, stone bench tops, ducted heating and evaporative cooling.Close to Mt Aitken Primary and Aitken Boulevard, this is a great opportunity to buy in one of Craigieburns finest locations.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 20 Hampstead Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Flexibility on a Huge 744sqm (approx) Block!
Tucked away in a quiet yet enviably convenient cul-de-sac location, this single-level home
occupies a vast allotment providing a family lifestyle of immediate quality and comfort along with options to further enhance or possibly develop in the future (STCA).
Every room filled with natural light, the home's free-flowing interior comprises a master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with BIRs), main family bathroom and dedicated study (potential 4th bedroom).
Adding to its family credentials is a separate front lounge and expansive open-plan living/dining area to the rear accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with tiled splashbacks, dishwasher, gas cooktop and a brand new dishwasher with warranty.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, video intercom and
new window furnishings throughout, plus a simply enormous north-facing backyard and side
driveway for multiple off-street parking.
Walking distance to a choice of bus routes on Newlyn Drive and Bridgewater Road, it's also
close to local parks and Aitken Creek trails, primary and secondary schools with a 3 minute walk to a kindergarten , Craigieburn Golf Course and Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
Insights: 8 Medstead Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Style and Comfort!
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a functional and flexible floorplan you will be impressed with the open plan living which provides a sense of space and comfort. Features include a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, large master bedroom complete with ensuite, split system heating/cooling, stylish main bathroom, built in robes, a second living area or large study upstairs, double lock up garage with remote control entry and so much more. All this plus a low maintenance backyard area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year around. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, public transport & schools. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 6 Thirlestane Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
